title: Scott Pioli on Draft Day 'war rooms', picks with the Pats/selection of Tom Brady (Football 4/23)
description:
What was it like in the room when the Patriots selected Tom Brady 199th overall in the 2000 Draft? Well on this episode, you get to hear from an executive that was in New England for that at-the-time unassuming moment, that turned out to be legendary. Former front office exec Scott Pioli discusses draft day memories and shares insights on picks of the past plus expectations for this year's draft.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en

To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
